metadata.title: CVE-2021-22263 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from13.0 before 14.0.9, all versions starting from 14.1 before 14.1.4, allversions starting from 14.2 before 14.2.2. A user account with 'external'status which is granted 'Maintainer' role on any project on the GitLabinstance where 'project tokens' are allowed may elevate its privilege to'Internal' and access Internal projects.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
